snippet: Richard Petty, a seven-time Nascar series champion, said that Danica Patrick could win a Sprint Cup Series race only “if everybody else stayed home.”
abstract: Richard Petty, seven-time Nascar series champion, says that Danica Patrick could win a Sprint Cup Series race only 'if everybody else stayed home.'
lead_paragraph: Richard Petty, a seven-time Nascar series champion, said that Danica Patrick could win a Sprint Cup Series race only “if everybody else stayed home.”
